name: New World of Lust
description:
I'm developing an interactive story based on HTML +18 with a greater focus on transformation, I don't know much English but I'm using a translator to try to help me so I warn you early on that there will be spelling errors. anyway, thanks for taking the time to take a look at my game, this will be my second game I'm making but I hope to keep going until I finish it. It's still in development but some parts that I'm finishing I'll put in the game and try to update frequently as much as possible.

In this game, the player will be William, a rpg game developer who fell into a deep sleep while working at his house and suddenly appears elsewhere, I'm thinking of many things to add to this game so wait for more.
